normalised: Did you know that when paying online, different platforms charge different convenience fees? For example, using U-P-I might cost rupee zero, but credit card payments can add two to three percent extra to your bill. Always check the final amount before hitting 'Pay Now'. Also, many sites offer discounts for using specific wallets like Paytm or PhonePe, sometimes up to rupees one hundred off. Keep an eye out for those deals!
